name: vesting_action_058
body: token :: mint_to (CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , MintTo { mint : ctx . accounts . mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . vesting_dst_058 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () } , & [& [b"vesting" , & [ctx . bumps ["auth"]]]]) , amount ,) ? ;

token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . vesting_dst_058 . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . vesting_src_058 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () } , & [& [b"vesting" , & [ctx . bumps ["auth"]]]]) , amount / 2 ,) ? ;
